description: Minimal Mistakes Jekyll theme npm build scripts
name: minimal-mistakes

scripts.build:js: npm run uglify && npm run add-banner
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs assets/js/vendor/jquery/jquery-3.2.1.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.backstretch.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.fitvids.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.greedy-navigation.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.magnific-popup.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.smooth-scroll.js assets/js/plugins/jquery.devkit-extends.js assets/js/_main.js -o assets/js/main.min.js -c -m --source-map url=main.min.js.map
